body:
Hi Guys!
Here is a new <<Avicus Forum Minigame>> called
"If you never knew me"
As the name is saying, How you would be as person and what you would doing if you never knew Avicus?

*_* I'd be crying for me bored and without anything in my life.
body_tagged:

title: If you never knew Avicus

replies.body: I wouldn't have the chance to meet so many amazing people.
replies.body_tagged: I wouldn't have the chance to meet so many amazing people.

replies.body: I would probably have quit minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: I would probably have quit minecraft.

replies.body: More than likely would have ended up at Mineplex.  Thanks for saving me <3
replies.body_tagged: More than likely would have ended up at Mineplex.  Thanks for saving me <3

replies.body: I would say, if I never played on or heard about Avicus, life would be the same as before I started to play on this server. Yes, I am thankful I got to know some amazing people and some people I just want to punch in the face. If we think Avicus never existed for me, I would live my life normal, I got my job, my girlfriend, yes my life is perfectly fine right now. :)

replies.body:
If I had never found Avicus... 
Well, I wouldn't have so many amazing friends who are so supportive and helpful, they've been there for me whenever I've needed them. I would most likely be stuck on my old server or other servers being a complete nub with nothing to do. I wouldn't be able to expierence such good and bad memories, yes we do thimgs in life that we regret... But most of my memories on Avicus are amazing and wonderful. I've never seen such an amazing community filled with helpful, dedicated, hard working people!
